ctu_text:
> **Selection Procedure:**

The Nominations /selections of the Professional shall be intimated immediately after the approval of the competent authority of the Council on a monthly basis. 
**NOTE:** The offer of the AICTE –Distinguished Professional Scheme shall be valid for the period mentioned in the request/ invitation letter. The Professional is requested to give concurrence for the same. 
> **Responsibility of Host Institute for Application:**


- Host Institute shall issue their expression of interest to the call by AICTE on specific topic of their interest.

", "briefDescription": "AICTE-Distinguished Professionals Scheme has been launched by the All India Council for Technical Education, Ministry of Education to improve the quality of Technical Education in India by utilizing the expertise of Professionals, Emeritus professors & Eminent Personalities to share their knowledge. ", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), under the Ministry of Education, has launched the AICTE-Distinguished Professionals Scheme.
